description:
O&O AppBuster is a free tool that removes unwanted pre-installed apps in Windows and restores accidentally deleted apps.

O&O AppBuster allows users to easily remove or restore pre-installed Microsoft and third-party apps on Windows. This portable software does not require installation and features an intuitive interface, making it accessible even to non-experts. Users can view hidden apps and undo changes using restore points. The tool is free for private, business, and educational use and supports all Windows 10 and 11 versions.
